note.p: Career: Dipl.RCS (England) 1780; Ordinance Chemist and Lecturer in Chemistry, Royal Artillery Academy, Woolwich (1795); Surgeon of Artillery, Surgeon to the Ordinace Medical Department
References: John H Appleby, 'Sir Alexander Crichton, FRS (1763-1856), Imperial Russian Physician at Large' in NR 1999 vol 53 pp 219-230, plate
Guy H Neild, 'William Cruickshank (FRS-1802): Clinical Chemist' in Nephrol Dial Transplant (1996) 11: 1885-1889

Notes: Birth place info inferred from the entries in the International Genealogical Index listing several men of the correct name spelling born in the counties of Aberdeen and Angus during the 1740s and 1750s. Possible death year of 1810
